page.title: 13EDUCATION IN 1985
page.content: An account of school today by Samantha Watson In Northchapel School we start at 4.5 years old and leave at 10 years old. When you leave our school you go to the Petworth Intermediate School.It is called Herbert Shiner School.You leave there at 13 years and go to Midhurst Grammar School for another 3 years.You can leave at 16 years if you want to. Our subjects at Northchapel are English,Mathematics,P.E.and games.In P.E. we do work on some part of our body on the floor and sometimes on the apparatus.In games we play netball, rounders,football,cricket and stoolball and athletics.We also study poetry and during each half-term we have a different topic on environmental work.We have started to do C.D.T. which is Craft,Design and Technology.
